divs: Sighting DetailsI can't remember the exact date but as I recall I had a light jacket on. the time is not exact either but it was before sunup. I had a paper route in Peoria when I was 14 and was getting near the end and was just walking down the middle of the street with my paper bag and folding a paper up for the next house. I happened to be looking up in the sky which as I said was still dark. I remember it was mostly cloudy and beyond that I could see alot of stars then I was what I thought was a falling star because it had a tail on it and I though cool a falling star. but then a split second later I saw five more lights shoot across that opening in the clouds going in the same direction as the "falling star." So I've always wondered if what I thought was a falling star was something more like a UFO in trouble because as I said the first light had a tail on it whereas the other five did not.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Peoria
There were no other sightings in Peoria on or around September 15th 1974
Summary: UFO's chasing a UFO in distress
